metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6070 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Adiscon LogAnalyzer before 3.6.6 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the hostname in (1) index.php or (2) detail.php.

criterions.comment: loganalyzer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
